Package com.petgame.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PetStateListener
    The interface provides a mechanism for tracking changes in the state of a pet.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScreen
    AbstractScreen serves as a base class for creating different game screens.
    ChoosePet
    The ChoosePet class represents a screen where the player can choose between different pets to start their game.
    DefaultPet
    Initialize the pet object in the beginning before the player chooses a pet This class extends the Pet class
    EnableTimeLimit
    The EnableTimeLimit class represents a screen where the player can enable and set time limits for playing the game.
    Furfrou
    The Furfrou class represents the Furfrou pet in the game.
    GamePlayUI
    The GamePlayUI class represents the main game interface where the player chooses Furfrou as their pet.
    GamePlayUIMagearna
    The GamePlayUIMagearna class represents the main game interface where the player chooses Magearna as their pet.
    GamePlayUITyrunt
    The GamePlayUI class represents the main game interface where the player chooses Furfrou as their pet.
    Instructions
    The Instructions class represents the screen where players can view the game instructions and objectives.
    Instructions2
    The Instructions class represents the screen where players can view the game instructions and objectives.
    Instructions3
    The Instructions class represents the screen where players can view the game instructions and objectives.
    Instructions4
    The Instructions class represents the screen where players can view the game instructions and objectives.
    Instructions5
    The Instructions class represents the screen where players can view the game instructions and objectives.
    Instructions6
    The Instructions class represents the screen where players can view the game instructions and objectives.
    Inventory  
    InventoryLoader
    InventoryLoader class is responsible for loading inventory data from a text file into an Inventory instance.
    InventorySaver
    InventorySaver class is responsible for saving inventory data to a text file in key=value format.
    InventoryUI  
    Item  
    Magearna
    Represents the Magearna pet, a type of Pet with specific stat parameters and behaviors.
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu class represents the main menu of the Timeless Tails minigame.
    MainMenuScreen
    The MainMenuScreen class represents the main menu screen of the Timeless Tails game.
    MeteorAvoidGUI
    The MeteorAvoidGUI class implements a simple obstacle-dodging game.
    ParentalControl
    The ParentalControl class provides functionality for controlling and tracking playtime.
    ParentalControlLoader
    This class provides a utility method to load parental control settings from a text file and update a ParentalControl instance with the loaded values.
    ParentalControlSaver
    The ParentalControlSaver class provides a utility method to save parental control settings from a ParentalControl instance to a text file.
    ParentalControlsLogin
    The ParentalControlsLogin class represents a login screen for accessing parental controls.
    ParentalControlsScreen
    The ParentalControlsScreen class represents the user interface for parental controls, allowing users to enable or disable time limits, revive pets, and view game statistics.
    Pet
    Abstract base class representing a virtual pet with various attributes and behaviors.
    PetLoader
    The class is responsible for loading pet data from save files and checking if a pet is dead.
    PetNameFurfrou
    The class shows a screen where the user can name their Furfrou pet.
    PetNameMagearna
    The class shows a screen where the user can name their Magearna pet.
    PetNameTyrunt
    The class shows a screen where the user can name their Tyrunt pet.
    PetSaver
    This class is responsible for saving Pet object data to a text file.
    Revive
    The class represents a screen where players can revive their pet by selecting a saved game slot.
    SaveFileScreen
    The SaveFileScreen class provides a GUI for selecting, loading, and deleting save files in the game.
    SettingsScreen
    The SettingsScreen class represents the settings menu UI for the game.
    Statistics
    The Statistics class is a screen that shows various gameplay statistics, such as total play time and average play time, to the user.
    Tyrunt
    This class represents a pet of type Tyrunt in the game.
